wordpressPage.title: Spaghetti/Marshmallow Tower Challenge
wordpressPage.content:
• Split your group into groups of 4 or 5
  • Give each group a bowl of marshmallows and some spaghetti
  • Explain that using only the marshmallows and spaghetti they have 5 minutes to build the tallest free-standing tower possible
  • The tallest free-standing tower wins!
